graph.packing

Class GRASPPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.GRASPPacker

  • public final class GRASPPacker
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a fast GRASP algorithm for the 1- or 2-packing problem, well-known combinatorial optimization problems. In the first case, node-weights are allowed, so the problem is really the maximum weighted independent set. Allows for Local-Search algorithms to kick-in after a solution has been constructed.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • isApproximatelyEqual

        private boolean isApproximatelyEqual(Node n,
                                     Node first)
        checks whether the node n is nearly equal to the currently "best" node to enter the partial solution of a 1-packing problem (MWIS problem).
        Parameters:
        n - Node
        first - Node
        Returns:
        true iff the two nodes are "nearly" equal (n's weight is no worse than the first's times the fudge factor and the nbors' sizes are at least equal to the first's times the same fudge factor)

      • isApproximatelyEqualWeight

        private boolean isApproximatelyEqualWeight(Node n,
                                           Node first)
        check whether node n is "close enough" to the first (and "best") node according to the node-weight criterion for the MWIS problem.
        Parameters:
        n - Node
        first - Node
        Returns:
        true iff the two nodes are "nearly" equal (n's weight is no worse than the first's times the fudge factor _alphaFactor).

      • setup

        private void setup()
        the method _g.makeNNbors() must have been called before if _k==2. This method is only called once from this object's constructor.

            throws ParallelException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws ParallelException
        invoke as java -cp <classpath> graph.packing.GRASPPacker <graph_file> <k> [numinitnodes(0)] [numiterations(1)] [do_local_search(false)] [dls_num_threads(1)] [max_allowed_time(ms)(+Inf)] [use_N2RXP_4_DLS(false)]. The graph_file contains the graph in the format specified in the comments of method utils.DataMgr.readGraphFromFile2(filename) and the numinitnodes is an optional number specifying how many (non-conflicting) nodes to choose randomly as an initial seed-set to grow from (default is zero). The solution found is written in the file "sol.out" in the current directory. It contains one line for each node included in the solution, and the line has the internal id of the node +1 (so the range of nodes is [1,...Graph.getNumNodes()].
        Parameters:
        args - String[] are as follows:
        • args[0] graph_file_name mandatory, the name of the file containing the graph
        • args[1] k mandatory, must be 1 or 2, describing the type of the problem
        • args[2] numinitnodes optional, if present describes the cardinality of an initial random population from which to attempt to construct a first partial solution. Default is 0.
        • args[3] numiterations optional, if present describes the number of major outer iterations to run. Default is 1.
        • args[4] do_local_search optional, if "true" implies a local search via the popt4jlib.LocalSearch.DLS algorithm to be performed when a solution is constructed in a major outer iteration. Default is false.
        • args[5] num_dls_threads optional, if present describes the number of threads to use in the DLS procedure if activated. Default is 1.
        • args[6] max_allowed_time optional, if present, sets the max. allowed time for the process to run (in milliseconds). Default is +infinity.
        • args[7] use_N2RXP_4_DLS optional, if present and true, will force the use of the IntSetN2RXPGraphAllMovesMaker move-maker in the local search (if args[4] evaluates to true). Otherwise, if local-search is asked for, the IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker class will be used as moves-maker in local-search. Default is false.
        Throws:
        ParallelException
